rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Fevizia's Cannoneer enters or attacks, exile up to one target artifact card you control or in your graveyard. When you do, Fevizia's Cannoneer becomes a copy of that card until end of turn except it's still a creature, has base power and toughness 2/3 and has vigilance. Return the exiled card to your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
